scene: A clock ticks loudly, yet time flows backward.
Rain falls upward, soaking the clouds.
Rain pours heavily, streets dry up quickly.
Rain falls quietly, yet the ground dries up.
A clock ticks forward, yet time runs backward.
"Rain pours down, streets flood, yet the ground is dry."
Rain falls up, street puddles dry up, sky clears.
A clock ticks loudly, hands spin backward, hastening time.
Rain falls steadily, yet the ground stays dry.
Rain pours down, streets dry up, flowers wilt.
Raindrops fall upward, wetting clouds, sky blinds earth.
A river flows uphill, defying gravity, mystifying.
A river flows uphill, shimmering against gravity.
